content.content: How to earn money with NitroStorm?
Any new store needs clients and NitroStorm is no exception! We want to develop a large and high-quality project for selling Nitro on Discord and you can help us in development!

Namely - help in advertising the project. We do NOT offer 2-3% profit from some purchase (as referral programs usually work). For the development of our project, we are ready to pay you all 100% of the profit, which means that by helping us you can really earn more than 100 rubles! If we managed to interest you, then let's continue!
Now let's talk about specific numbers. We have several types of products and the profit from each of them is respectively different, namely:
- Nitro FULL (Month): 40 rubles
- Nitro FULL (YEAR): 400 rubles
- Nitro BASIC (Month): 40 rubles
- 1 BOOST: 40 rubles

That is, if you attract 30 people per month to our project (that is, only 1 person per day), then on average you can earn up to 7500 rubles. Sounds really good, right? And no special effort is required.

Well, now let's talk about how everything is arranged specifically. We have a Discord server (https://discord.gg/BNsV86yGQA) to which you will need to attract clients. After you join the Discord server, go to the chat called "#üìòjob‚îÇearnings", there is the same information as here, but it is there that you can get the "Advertiser Team" role, which makes you part of our advertising team!
Now, you need to create your infinite link to our Discord server, as shown in the pictures:
Use this link to invite buyers, do not use other people's links, as only if the buyer came through your link will you be able to prove that the client you attracted is yours!
In the chat "‚≠êinvites‚îÇinvitations" all invitations are shown:

If the invited user buys Nitro, then the one who processed the purchase will report in the #moderators-only chat that the user earned 85 rubles, immediately after that we will ask for your data and we will immediately transfer your 85 rubles to a card, QIWI or another wallet.

We try to get the greatest trust of our clients and you respectively. We do NOT send money after 10 buyers, 10 years after invitations and blah-blah-blah. We pay for your work IMMEDIATELY after your client buys nitro!

And now let's talk about how exactly you need to invite clients. The first thing we recommend you do is tell all your acquaintances and friends. Most likely, it is they who have the greatest trust in you, respectively, the conversion is higher, which means more earnings!

In second place, we recommend you use Discord servers. Talk, communicate with users in voice channels and chats on large and not very large Discord servers. When communicating, we do not recommend you to immediately "push" the product, communicate naturally, as if you just came to chat and casually mention our project, that you can earn money on it, that you can buy Nitro from us and that we have big discounts and so on. In your profile, we also recommend you to leave a link to our Discord server, for example:
Reminder! Leave exactly your own link! So that we can recognize that it was you who invited the buyer!
Another option we recommend is Telegram channels, VK groups, forums and the like, you can spam, communicate with clients on these platforms and so on.
You can write your own messages to each place separately and this is at your discretion, but we can also suggest one template:

"Any new store needs clients and NitroStorm is no exception! We want to develop a large and high-quality project for selling Nitro on Discord and you can help us in development! Namely - help in advertising the project. We do NOT offer 2-3% profit from some purchase (as referral programs usually work). For the development of our project, we are ready to pay you all 100% of the profit, which means that by helping us you can really earn more than 100 rubles! If we managed to interest you, then write in private messages! And while you can read more about our idea here https://vk.com/@nitro_storm-kak-zarabotat-pri-pomoschi-nitrostorm"
If you wish, you can use exactly it, but we don't force you!

There are many places where you can also advertise our product, perhaps you know them yourself, we recommend you try all possible options, you can also use What's up, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, Twitch and such a list can be infinitely large!
We do not force you to work for us constantly, for starters you can just try, and if everything works out for you, then continue, earn and develop the NitroStorm project together!
